summary: Director Michael Apted interviews the same group of British-born adults after a 7 year wait as to the changes that have occurred in their lives during the last seven years.
cast: Bruce Balden|Jacqueline Bassett|Symon Basterfield|Andrew Brackfield|John Brisby|Peter Davies|Suzanne Dewey|Charles Furneaux|Nicholas Hitchon|Neil Hughes|Lynn Johnson|Paul Kligerman|Susan Sullivan|Tony Walker|Michael Apted|Michelle Murphy
title: 28 Up
